title: FS: 43 1910 T218 cards – all SGC graded – includes boxers, golfers, billiards, more!!
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: FS: 43 1910 T218 cards – all SGC graded – includes boxers, golfers, billiards, more!!
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have for sale 43 1910 T218 cards – all of them have been graded by SGC.   Included in the group are boxers, track athletes, billiards players, aviators and more!

I have listed the name of each, along with the SGC grade, followed by the price.  Shipping will be an extra $3 for any size order.  Backs are Mecca or Hassan on all of them – no Tolstois unfortunately to offer at the current time!

Buy at least 3 cards and knock 10% off the prices. 

Send me a PM if you would like scans of any of them, and I will be happy to send along!  (Please include an email address for ease of sending you scans.)

Thanks for looking!
Scott
